adviseScripts.text: Commander, would you take a look at this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: This is a drawing Rei gave me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It's cute. She's a talented artist.
Is this supposed to be a fox?
I think so too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana's smile remains plastered on her face for a while.
Rei apparently has an innate talent for drawing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I was told it was a picture of me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: No wonder it looks so cool.
I personally think it's more on the adorable side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Marciana about Rei's drawings.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Do I look angry to you right now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: You look the same as always.
Yes. Is there something wrong?
Hmm... I'll take that as a yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I've got to try and make another expression.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Nothing's wrong. Unless you consider seeing a cat along the road worth getting angry over, which I don't.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm the furthest thing from upset, yet I keep getting told I look angry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Coming off as irate has its own appeal.
I spend time with Marciana researching expressions.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Ein has been using this expression lately, "hip".
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: What does it mean to be hip?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: When you're unique and novel in your look or demeanor.
Just take a look at me. I'm hip.
Okay, I think I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: If I want to understand Ein, I need to look into what's hip these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: ... Sorry?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm not quite sure I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Would it be okay if I continued observing you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend time determining what hip is with Marciana.
I sometimes get worried that my shortcomings as a teacher
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: will negatively affect my students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: You don't have any shortcomings, Marciana.
You're always doing your best, and that's all you can do.
Nobody is perfect, and I'm no exception.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Still, thank you for saying that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I suppose that's true...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: The kids will see that, and it's sure to leave a positive effect on them.
Thank you for the encouragement, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious counseling session with Marciana.
Commander, I have a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: How do you get the most out of your designated rest times?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Close your eyes and take deep breaths.
Bring my hands up and cover Marciana's eyes.
Phewwwwww!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Nothing really feels different, but I'll keep trying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Clear your mind and only focus on being comfortable.
Your hands are warm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: They put me at ease.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend time taking a rest with Marciana.
Do you want to try some of this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It's a cake with a topper of a fox hugging a penguin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Awwww so cute!
What flavor is it?
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It reminds me of you hugging Rei.
... I didn't think of it like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Um...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I bought it once I saw the fox and the penguin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I didn't even pay attention to what flavor it was.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time eating some delicious cake with Marciana.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: These small desserts I've got here are called animal macarons.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I don't think I'll be able to eat them, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: What should I do with them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: How about giving them to the students?
I could eat some.
That's a brilliant idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: The students will be super excited about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll hand them out first thing tomorrow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: So... you're going to devour this happy little smiling doggie, right in front of me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I talk about macarons with Marciana.
Zwei has been pushing herself a bit too hard with her studies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: What should I say to help out?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Tell her not to overdo it.
Compliment her and say that she's been doing well.
I don't think that'll be enough to make her pump the brakes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to think about it a little more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I think you may be right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm not especially skilled in this area, but I'll do my best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I talk about Zwei.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure how they got here, but there's a big pile of dolls lying on your desk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Neon left them. Aren't they cute?
Neon won a bunch of them at a claw machine, so she must have left a few there. Do you want one?
Actually... they are kind of cute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'd say she left more than a few.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Anyway... I suppose I'll take one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I talk about dolls.
Have you ever heard of parfait?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It's a layered dessert made with a variety of fruit, fresh cream, and custard.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I have, but I've never tried it. Do you want to go try some together?
I have, and they're delicious. You should try some next time you get the chance.
I'd like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Just me? On my own?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll think about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I talk about various desserts with Marciana.
Drones are all the rage with the student body.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I can't tell you how many classroom windows have gotten shattered because of them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm trying to think about how I should handle this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Is there any way to encourage them to fly their drones outside?
You should forbid them from flying drones inside the classroom.
We could tell them that if they don't fly their drones inside the classroom,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: we'll hold a drone flying contest or something like that. Thanks for the advice, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: If we crack the whip too harshly straight off, it'll result in a backlash and end poorly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I've got to think of a way to spin this situation into a positive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I talk about the direction education is heading in.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: what do you think a good teacher should be like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Someone who guides the students and helps them achieve good results.
Someone who recognizes the students for who they are, and helps them move towards a brighter future.
That's true. We should be a leading example for our students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: However, teachers are far from infallible. We need to develop along with our students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Hm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I think you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It's something that may seem obvious to the outside observer, but in reality, it's a very difficult virtue to uphold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I speak about what is the role of a teacher with Marciana.
You know the data instrument I've got on my belly button, T.Va.?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I can't quite put my finger on it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: but it feels like the data sync speed for T.Va. has been awfully sluggish lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Put a blanket over Marciana's stomach.
Have you spoken to M.M.R. or Missilis?
This should help, shouldn't it?
It does feel nice and warm. Thank you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I have. Whenever I feel something is amiss, I put in a request to M.M.R.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: They said there wasn't anything wrong, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I'll just have to keep my eye on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I talk about T.Va.
*Whirrrrr*
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: And Rei's test paper as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: *Whirrrrr*
That drone seems to act like your assistant.
That drone sounds kinda cute when it's whizzing about.
Very much so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I use it to maximize my work efficiency.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It helps me a lot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Now that you've mentioned it, I suppose that's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I talk about drones with Marciana.
My tablet was upgraded recently,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: but I'm having a hard time getting used to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: The interface is totally different from the last version.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I can help you familiarize yourself with it.
Isn't there an instruction manual or tutorial that'll walk you through everything?
Sure. Press this button to turn it on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I checked, but couldn't find anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure I'll get used to it the more I use it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend time looking at the tablet with Marciana.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Rei saw a picture of a fox in class today,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: and kept calling me "Miss Foxy" all day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I don't look like a fox, do I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: You're clearly flirting with me right now.
Sure you do. Foxes are intelligent as well as easy on the eyes.
Excuse me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: What does that have to do with my question?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: There are many ancient legends of fox spirits seducing people. So I'd say you're rather fox-like.
... I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I can't say I necessarily agree with you, but... thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend time searching for fox pictures with Marciana.
M.M.R. sent me next year's curriculum.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It clearly hadn't taken the individual needs of the students into account, so I sent it back for corrections.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I just got a reply saying that if I want any changes made, I'll have to do them myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: They clearly trust you.
I also think you should make the changes that you want.
They wouldn't leave something so important up to you if they didn't have faith in your abilities.
... I guess I'll proceed with making the necessary changes, then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Thank you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I don't know if it's a good idea for me to operate entirely on my own on this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll make the necessary corrections, then contact M.M.R. again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I spend time watching Marciana work.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: In order to broaden the knowledge of our students, we're planning a field trip.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Is there a location you would recommend?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: How about the M.M.R.'s research lab?
How about the animal shelter run by Happy Zoo?
We've already visited the research lab,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: and the students are going to want to go somewhere new.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to think it over for a little while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: The one filled with dogs and cats?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: That would definitely be an intellectual field unfamiliar to our students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the advice, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I spitball more field trip ideas.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: you're a graduate of the military academy, aren't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: When you were a student there, what expectations did you have of your instructors?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I would have killed to have someone like you there.
I honestly can't really remember much. I was more focused on wanting better meals.
... Are you serious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Deadly serious.
I'm honored to hear you say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Food is important, no doubt,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: but I'm afraid that's not my area of expertise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I share more about the military academy with Marciana.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Ein keeps pestering me about taking a group photo.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: She's even mentioned matching outfits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: What do you think would look best?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: How about something nice and sporty?
How about some cute animal pajamas?
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for your advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: I'll bring it up to the students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: It will be our first photo together, so I suppose it'd be good to wear something memorable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Animal pajamas... could be fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marciana

adviseScripts.text: Marciana and I spend some time contemplating what she and the others could wear in a group photo.
